page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT IN CHINGFORD
page.content: Chingford has better employment than that of it's neighbouring town,Walth- amstow,also a part of the London Borough of Waltham Forest.However school leavers may have problems find- ing work,but with persistence most find it eventually.There is alot of work to be found in Chingford as it is a fairly well developed town.The work to be found is various consisting of: {Manual work}ie.road repairers,dustmen and builders. {Social work}ie.home helps etc {Education}ie.teachers,dinner ladies or education officers. And there is a fair amount of office work and shopwork to be found in the town of Chingford.
